title: Hike Santa Barbara foothills!
priceLong: $40 per person, $200 maximum price and up to 10 guests. (805) 564-1819
body: Up to 10 guests can enjoy a beautiful mountain trail in Santa Barbara that leads to sweeping ocean and island views. The tour lasts approximately three hours and includes transportation from anywhere in Santa Barbara. Call us for more details! (805) 564-1819
